title: How to clear the entrance exams for IB board schools? What are some resources - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ll take it that you are trying to get into an IB school. The first thing that I recommend you do is that you become absolutely fluent and understand the in’s and out’s of the school's first language (normally English). This means having a deeper analysis and evaluation of the language and how it is used in courses. Also, having the ability to critically think about different perspectives is crucial. I have linked some resources for you. https://ibresources.github.io/#ib-past-papers theibstop.com International Baccalaureate • r/IBO IB Notes & Resources (Updated 2020) - Nail IB IB Revision & Resources Hope that helps and good luck :)
